targets.query: SELECT "bfd_nbr_ip" AS "Neighbour IP", "bfd_nbr_if" AS "Interface", "bfd_nbr_state" AS "State", "bfd_nbr_remote_state" AS "Remote State" FROM "autogen"."xe_bfd_nbrs" WHERE ("source" = 'de-fra20e-aws-sie-rg02') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "source", "type" LIMIT 1

params: Remote State - 1 means UP,  0 means DOWN

Counter for port block allocation request failures

targets.query: SELECT last("ip_nat_statistics/entries"), last("ip_nat_statistics/entry_timeouts"), last("ip_nat_statistics/frag_pak_count"), last("ip_nat_statistics/hits"), last("ip_nat_statistics/in2out_drops"), last("ip_nat_statistics/out2in_drops"), last("ip_nat_statistics/interrupt_switched"), last("ip_nat_translation/limit_entry_add_fail"), last("ip_nat_translation/pool_stats_drop"), last("ip_nat_translation/vrf_name"), last("ip_nat_translation/statics"), last("ip_nat_translation/packets_punted       "), last("ip_nat_translation/portlist_req_fail") FROM "autogen"."xe_nat_stats" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$device_tenant$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
